name: Bedford Deli
address: 26 Bedford Park Blvd, Bronx, NY 10468, USA

reviews.text: Ordered mix over rice and asked to make it juicy and tasty. Even though it was so bad and i threw it to garbage
Excellent service. Love this shop. They also sell MrBeast burgers. I tried the impossible burger, and it was amazing. Definitely recommended.
Trash everything is old wasted money on something that ended up being stale
Food is excellent. Great prices and better customer service.
Nice store but they need to improve on the space cause dam i feel squeezed..
Found a white piece of plastic in my food, sometimes it can get to expensive.

Order via uber eats, there chicken over rice is terrible, nasty and not worth the 10 dollars at ALL, I also order a sandwich that was super dry, overcooked and missing the veggies. Would not recommend ordering food from here.
Good food quick food when ordering ahead using grub hub..friendly and fast service
